title: Constant disconnect from game
body: I'm constantly getting disconnected from games "Attempting to reconnect" when my ping is fine, and then I'm ending up with a lower priority queue. Can someone please get back to me on this? Because it is defiantly not my computer.

replies.body:
>Because it is defiantly not my computer.

At first I thought that was a misspelling of "definitely", but upon rereading it I understood that it makes complete sense. I salute you.

What ISP are you with?

Also let it be known that the servers are crap.
